info.name: Main
info.description:
# Servers and Resources

LP (Licensing Platform) - [https://music.clicknclear.com](https://music.clicknclear.com)  
LP API - [https://music.clicknclear.com/api](https://music.clicknclear.com/api)  
LVS (License Verification System) - [https://verification.clicknclear.com](https://verification.clicknclear.com)  
LVS API - [https://verification.clicknclear.com/api](https://verification.clicknclear.com/api)  
Support Email - [support@clicknclear.com](mailto:support@clicknclear.com)  
Tech Team Email - [techteam@clicknclear.com](mailto:techteam@clicknclear.com)

# API Keys

To create an API key please make sure you first contact a ClicknClear admin so they can enable API Key support for your user account.

## Api Key Setup

*   Navigate to [https://music.clicknclear.com/profile](https://music.clicknclear.com/profile) (login if you are not)
*   If your account is setup correctly you should have an "API Keys" section. If you cannot see this section please get in contact via the support email or the tech team email.
*   Click on the "Create API Key" button
*   Enter a name for the API Key, this is to help you identify it at a later date
*   Copy the API key and store it somewhere safe, you will not be able to view it again.
    

# Authentication

See the Login routes for more information on how to get Access Token and Refresh Tokens.  
Once you have your access token you should Add the "Authorization" header with the value of "Bearer {YOUR_API_KEY}" to every one of your ClicknClear API requests.

EG:

```
'Authorzation': 'Bearer $2b$04$j7...'

```

# Server Responses

Throughout our APIs we heavily utilise [HTTP Codes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status) to signify the status of the request. In general, a 4xx status code will have the error type and usually a message to help the developer know why the request failed. Below is an example of an erroneous login request.

```
{
    "statusCode": 400,
    "error": "Bad Request",
    "message": "[\n  {\n    \"code\": \"invalid_type\",\n    \"expected\": \"string\",\n    \"received\": \"undefined\",\n    \"path\": [\n      \"apiKey\"\n    ],\n    \"message\": \"Required\"\n  }\n]"
}

```

If you are consistently receiving 400s or even 500s and you're not sure how to fix it please email the Tech Team email with steps to reproduce your issue.

request.description: This endpoint should be used to get an access token and a refresh token from an API Key. Once the access token is fetched it should be used to authenticate to other API endpoints

formdata.description: The file of the sound recording ot be verified. Accepted Mime Types: 'audio/mpeg', 'audio/vnd.wav', 'audio/wave', 'audio/wav', 'audio/x-wav', 'audio/x-pn-wav', 'audio/mp3', 'audio/mp4'
The file of the sound recording ot be verified. Accepted Mime Types: 'audio/mpeg', 'audio/vnd.wav', 'audio/wave', 'audio/wav', 'audio/x-wav', 'audio/x-pn-wav', 'audio/mp3', 'audio/mp4'
